    • Method Detail

      • getHighlightsAtXValue

        protected java.util.List<Highlight> getHighlightsAtXValue(float xVal,
                                              float x,
                                              float y)
        Description copied from class: ChartHighlighter
        Returns a list of Highlight objects representing the entries closest to the given xVal. The returned list contains two objects per DataSet (closest rounding up, closest rounding down).
        Overrides:
        getHighlightsAtXValue in class ChartHighlighter<CombinedDataProvider>
        Parameters:
        xVal - the transformed x-value of the x-touch position
        x - touch position
        y - touch position
        Returns:
